name: James Rossiter
status: Racing in Super GT and Super Formula
introduction: James Rossiter (born 25 August 1983 in Oxford, Oxfordshire, England, United Kingdom) is a British racing driver who last served as a test driver for ForceIndia in 2013. Outside of Formula One, he currently competes in the Japanese Super GT series and the Japanese Super Formula series, and has raced at the 24 Hours of Le Mans for the past two years.
